data.title: Dive into anything
data.text:
- HEY guys, that's all I have time for today! A huge thanks for all the amazing questions.

And don't forget to check out the book, out now! https://linktr.ee/abroadinjapanbook

Hello everyone - Chris here!To celebrate 10 years of living in Japan and the release of my new book I thought I'd try a good old reddit AMA - so feel free to ask me anything about Japan, film-making, or my favourite type of convenience store fried chicken.

I’ll leave this thread open for the next hour to gather some questions and I’ll be back to answer them at 11:00 JST!

(Other timezones - 22:00 ET (sat) / 19:00 PT(sat) / 02:00 GMT)
